item.title: Email sent to Li Keqiang regarding problems I am facing in China, second email
item.description: FROM: [NAME REDACTED FOR PRIVACY] SUBJECT: Problems in China - problem number 2/x DATE: 2019-10-10 at 17:45 (Beijing time) TO: Mr. Li Keqiang, Premier of the State Council of the People’s Republic of China 尊敬的李克强先生以及正在阅读这封信的工作人员： 我在申请中国手机号时遇到了问题。 我多

item.title: Email sent to Li Keqiang regarding problems I am facing, first email
item.description: FROM: [NAME REDACTED FOR PRIVACY] SUBJECT: Problems in China - problem number 1/x DATE: 2019-10-10 at 16:22 (Beijing time) TO: Mr. Li Keqiang, Premier of the State Council of the People’s Republic of China 尊敬的李克强先生以及正在阅读这封信的工作人员： 我通过点击下面这个网址的“联系总理“
